episode: I  contacted a state senator about an issue I've been pushing, to amend the Oklahoma Anatomical Gifts Act to allow for a free market in human organs and tissues for transplant.  He agreed it would save lives and money, but that it would be impossible to pass in the current legislature and, since he can only submit a limited number of bills, he declined to do anything about it.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I contacted a state senator, asking him to sponsor a bill to amednt the Oklahoma Anatomical Gifts Act.  He saidit would be unlikely to pass through the legislature, and declined to sponsor it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. It must be frustrating, but don't give up hope. Maybe there's another way to push for change.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: There is, but nothing easy to do.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand, it can be tough. Keep pushing, your efforts matter.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I need to get the insurance companies on board, they would save money with the bill.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a smart move. If you can show them the benefits, they might support you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: But that's unlikely too.  The healthcare insurance industry is highly regulated, and they don't want to get into controversial issues.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's tough. Maybe try finding a different angle or ally?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: So far, my main ally is the Oklahoma Libertarian Party, which doesn't have a lot of influence yet.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Keep working with them. Every bit of support counts.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I'm considering running for Oklahoma Insurance Commissioner.  Even if I lose - which I will - it will give us an opportunity to further explain and push for this issue.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a bold move! It could really raise awareness.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes.  it would also be quite expensive.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: True. Maybe explore fundraising or sponsorships?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's what I'll be doing the next few months, see if I can get any support.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Good plan. Hope it goes well!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Even if I lose, if I can get 5% of the vote in the race, I will get ballot access for the Libertarian Party for two more years.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great goal! Good luck!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks, I will certainly need it, and a few bucks as well.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely! Every bit helps.
